# 📚 Weekly Trending Repositories Update

### 📅 Date: March 22, 2025

Welcome to this week collection of the latest Github REPOSSS! Below you'll find the top 10 papers for each category.

💡 **Note**: For a better reading experience and access to more papers, please visit our [Github Repository](https://github.com/marc-ko/daily-trending-repo).

---

| **[Second-Me](https://github.com/mindverse/Second-Me)** | Train your AI self, amplify you, bridge the world | Python | Second Me is an open-source prototype that allows users to create their own AI self, preserving individuality and enhancing digital identity while ensuring privacy and control over personal data. It features locally trained AI with hierarchical memory modeling, a decentralized network for scaling intelligence, and tools for collaboration and application development. |  | 1477 | https://github.com/mindverse/Second-Me |
| **[cursor-talk-to-figma-mcp](https://github.com/sonnylazuardi/cursor-talk-to-figma-mcp)** | Cursor Talk To Figma MCP | TypeScript | This project integrates Cursor AI with Figma through a Model Context Protocol (MCP), enabling programmatic reading and modification of designs in Figma via a TypeScript server and a Figma plugin. The repository includes setup instructions, usage guidelines, and tools for document manipulation, element creation, and styling within Figma. | <details><summary>agent...</summary><p>agent, agentic, agentic-ai, ai, cursor, design, figma, mcp</p></details> | 1256 | https://github.com/sonnylazuardi/cursor-talk-to-figma-mcp |
| **[anubis](https://github.com/TecharoHQ/anubis)** | Weighs the soul of incoming HTTP requests using proof-of-work to stop AI crawlers | Go | Anubis is a tool that protects upstream resources from scraper bots by implementing a SHA256 proof-of-work challenge, which may result in your website not being indexed by some search engines. It is intended as a solution for situations where alternatives like Cloudflare are not viable. | <details><summary>defen...</summary><p>defense, security</p></details> | 884 | https://github.com/TecharoHQ/anubis |
| **[unity-mcp](https://github.com/justinpbarnett/unity-mcp)** | A Unity MCP server that allows MCP clients like Claude Desktop or Cursor to perform Unity Editor actions. | C# | The Unity MCP Package facilitates communication between Unity and Large Language Models (LLMs) using the Model Context Protocol (MCP), allowing developers to automate workflows, manage assets, and control the Unity Editor programmatically. It requires Unity 2020.3 LTS or newer and Python, enabling features like asset management, scene control, and script integration. | <details><summary>ai, a...</summary><p>ai, ai-integration, mcp, unity</p></details> | 715 | https://github.com/justinpbarnett/unity-mcp |
| **[open-wegram-bot](https://github.com/wozulong/open-wegram-bot)** | 【零费用】一个让人呼吸顺畅的 Telegram 双向私聊机器人 🤖 / [Zero Cost] A Smooth-Operating Two-Way Private Messaging Telegram Bot 🤖  | JavaScript | Open Wegram Bot (OWB) 是一个基于 Cloudflare Worker / Vercel 的 Telegram 双向私聊机器人，允许用户轻松发送和接收消息，无需服务器或数据库，且支持多种简单的部署方式。该机器人设计为无状态，零成本运行，使用 Telegram 官方 API 保障安全性。 | <details><summary>teleg...</summary><p>telegram, telegram-bot, telegram-bots</p></details> | 646 | https://github.com/wozulong/open-wegram-bot |
| **[Classless.css](https://github.com/DigitallyTailored/Classless.css)** | A lightweight, classless CSS framework that makes simple websites look better without requiring any additional markup. | CSS | Classless.css is a lightweight CSS framework designed for creating stylish websites without the need for classes, featuring responsive design, dark mode support, and enhancements for typography, forms, and tables. |  | 589 | https://github.com/DigitallyTailored/Classless.css |
| **[DAPO](https://github.com/BytedTsinghua-SIA/DAPO)** | An Open-source RL System from ByteDance Seed and Tsinghua AIR |  | DAPO is an open-source reinforcement learning system developed by ByteDance Seed and Tsinghua AIR, featuring the Decoupled Clip and Dynamic Sampling Policy Optimization algorithm, which achieves state-of-the-art performance in large-scale LLM RL. The project includes algorithm details, code infrastructure, and curated datasets, aimed at enhancing accessibility for the research community. |  | 586 | https://github.com/BytedTsinghua-SIA/DAPO |
| **[ableton-mcp](https://github.com/ahujasid/ableton-mcp)** |  | Python | AbletonMCP integrates Ableton Live with Claude AI via the Model Context Protocol (MCP), enabling direct control over music production tasks such as track creation, manipulation, and session control. It features two-way communication through a socket server and allows for MIDI and audio track manipulation, instrument selection, and clip creation. |  | 395 | https://github.com/ahujasid/ableton-mcp |
| **[gemini-image-editing-nextjs-quickstart](https://github.com/google-gemini/gemini-image-editing-nextjs-quickstart)** | Get started with native image generation and editing using Gemini 2.0 and Next.js | TypeScript | The Gemini 2.0 Flash Image Generation and Editing project allows users to generate and edit images using Google Gemini 2.0 Flash through text prompts and natural language instructions, while maintaining conversation context for iterative refinements. It features a responsive UI built with Next.js and offers capabilities for both image creation and editing, along with instructions for local development and deployment. | <details><summary>gemin...</summary><p>gemini, gemini-api</p></details> | 371 | https://github.com/google-gemini/gemini-image-editing-nextjs-quickstart |
| **[3dgrut](https://github.com/nv-tlabs/3dgrut)** |  | Cuda | This repository implements **3D Gaussian Ray Tracing (3DGRT)** and **3D Gaussian Unscented Transform (3DGUT)**, which enhance rendering of volumetric Gaussian particles with support for distorted cameras and complex effects. It introduces a hybrid method, **3DGRUT**, combining rasterization for primary rays and ray tracing for secondary rays to improve performance and flexibility. |  | 262 | https://github.com/nv-tlabs/3dgrut |
